long_description: Don't be afraid to push yourself during yoga, spin class or while making time up your favorite mountain trail. The prAna Jacquard headband helps keeps your hair in place and sweat out of the way. Soft, stretchy blend of polyester, nylon and spandex stays in place without being too tight. Wide fabric band can be worn flat or scrunched.
short_description: Don't be afraid to push yourself during yoga, spin class or while making time up your favorite mountain trail. The prAna Jacquard headband helps keeps your hair in place and sweat out of the way.
